SELECT sp.project_id, sp.tenant_id, sp.name AS name, sp.description, sua.nick_name AS accessor, su.nick_name AS auditor, sp.project_status, sp.create_time,
tmr.UPF, tmr.VAF, tmr.DFP, tmr.GSC, tmr.status AS assessment_status, tmr.S AS adjustment_factor,
ar.total_cost, ar.labor_cost, ar.risk_cost, ar.quality_cost, ar.dev_service_cost, ar.adjusted_dev_service_cost, ar.created_at AS assessment_created_at,
CASE WHEN prs.project_id IS NOT NULL THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS report_status
FROM sys_project sp LEFT JOIN tb_measure_res tmr ON sp.project_id = tmr.project_id LEFT JOIN assessment_detail_results ar ON sp.project_id = ar.project_id LEFT JOIN project_report_status prs ON sp.project_id = prs.project_id LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON sp.auditor_id = su.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_user sua ON sp.accessor_id = sua.user_id
WHERE sp.tenant_id = #{tenantId}
